Articles.Content: Xannari, look at THIS

> 
> Xannari, look at THIS

Can't. Sampa just arrived. As much as I would like to...
\*sigh\* Ok, you old warhorse, it's time to show that even you can still fight when injured...
Sampa, no! You are the reason we haven't descended into anarchy!
My eyes are scarred. Dark, I'm more injured than you!
\*Junior and Laythe visit my quarters only to find a not detailing what I was planning\*
Umm... Computer, go ahead and load up the armaments, just in case. Keep the comm open though.

Hey, what's this? (Opens closet door)

Oh my god....
Well,I'm limping because my leg was hurt when I fell off my bed.
Whoa, Sampa
...Sampa? You wanna say something? ...Anything?

What is it? Gimme the note!

Good god....

Visits the first room in Xannari's base and begins to hack into the system and delete the stolen data, including the logs. Also deletes vital system functions. \*you may be an excellent hacker, Xannari, but so am I! I then plant a bomb on the computer terminal.

Look what's in the closet.... (Takes pictures)

Gotta sent this to the Daily Galaxy...

- - - Updated - - -

Sampa... Just WOW....

Laythe also finds an email open on my computer, detailing a court marshal on the charge of treason due not only to the loss of half of the Cerberus fleet in the initial combat with Xannari, but also the loss of the Citadel.

> 
> Laythe also finds an email open on my computer, detailing a court marshal on the charge of treason due not only to the loss of half of the Cerberus fleet in the initial combat with Xannari, but also the loss of the Citadel.

And its for Sampa

- - - Updated - - -

(Sends Sampa's logs to the AI, causing it to short-circuit)
I reach the second room, where there are several automated guards and a security console at the center of the room and camera's surrounding it.

Computer, load Ghost Protocol; generate all bits of data based on sequence memory, then store them in suspension mode. 

Alright, you want a cyber war? Computer, activate AI! Sir, we are being attacked by Sampa. There's a bomb set to detonate on the exterior terminal. Emit an ambient burst of energy equal to it's own output; that should disable it.

Computer, how's progress? ...Computer?

You deleted the vocals... Great. Those were planted there! I'll have to make all the voice overs again!

Computer, pull the data out of suspension, and start duplicating tactical. Have the AI countermend Sampa's attempts to disrupt station functionality.

**Opens comm**

Umm... I'm gonna have to ask you to stop, or I will destroy you right now.

I'll also keep up my end. Internals, activate enhanced visual acuity. I wanna leave him no chance.
Sampa, ready to activate Operation Sentience?
Hacked into the computer again, this time to communicate directly, "not THIS time, Xannari... \*pulls the trigger, detonating the first computer core\*"
Omnipotence, here I come!
Begin transfer to independent system aboard the ship, in case he's got a backup plan. If worse comes to be, we'll jump out and blast him into oblivion.
Laythe only hears his only voice coming from the bed...indicating that I removed my communicator before leaving

Fires all Kinemetic warheads into Xannari's station, beaming Sampa aboard.

Computer, set course for the Great Attractor.

> 
> Hacked into the computer again, this time to communicate directly, "not THIS time, Xannari... \*pulls the trigger, detonating the first computer core\*"

[Another record, there is no core. My computers are set up in a decentralized manor. It's more efficient]

Computer, launch units 2 and 3 to intercept and destroy! I see you've got backup... Also activate 011 defense perimeter!
